nodes.text: The Mark of Courage was a sculpture. It was awarded to a spacer in 1.5 ABY after they completed a task in an effort to become a hero, which displayed their courage and bravery. When combined with the other "Mark" sculptures, it formed a spherical shape.

A spacer, under the task of a strange Rodian hermit, gained this sculpture after displaying true courage by destroyed a wild bladeback boar that had been terrorizing the settlement of Mos Espa on Tatooine.
